biotools.summary: High-throughput detection and tracking of cells and intracellular spots in mother machine experiments | BACteria in Mother Maching Analyzer (BACMMAN) is a software allowing fast and reliable automated image analysis of high-throughput 2D/3D time-series images from mother machine. Mother machine is a very popular microfluidic device allowing investigating biological processes in bacteria at the single-cell level | BACMMAN: BACteria in Mother Machine Analyzer | BACMMAN was designed to analyse data from Mother machine experiments
